title: Zoo Ah-Choooo
description: Watch out! A giant ZOO AH-CHOOOO is headed your way! Funny sound effects and wacky illustrations make this a laugh-out-loud favorite.Snow Leopard started Ah-choooo! Elephant passed it RRRrrr-eee-ahh-PHOOOO ! Now twelve Seals are spreading Ka-Frrrooo OOOOOOOOMMMMM ! A geyser bursts, a mud volcano erupts, and chaos reigns! The zookeeper tries his best to minimize the mayhem, but he can't keep up! Finally, he calls in the animal doctor. At last all is again quiet at the zoo until...was that a YAAAAWN ?
author: Peter Mandel
